definition: a light, self-propelled movement upwards or forwards, to hit something so that it bounces
details:
noun
- a light, self-propelled movement upwards or forwards
= synonyms: saltation
- the quality of a substance that is able to rebound
= synonyms: bounciness
- rebounding from an impact (or series of impacts)
= synonyms: bouncing
verb
- to hit something so that it bounces
= example: to hit something so that it bounces
- to eject from the premises
= example: to eject from the premises
- to spring back
= example: to spring back
= synonyms: spring
- to move up and down repeatedly
= example: to move up and down repeatedly
= synonyms: bob, jounce
- to leap suddenly
= example: to leap suddenly
- to refuse to accept and send back
= example: to refuse to accept and send back
- to come back after being refused
= example: to come back after being refused
